title: Sadece Arkadaşız
overview: The life of F. Ece and Umut, who decided to share the same house; He is upset by a surprise decision from Umut's aunt. The aunt, who has decided to dispose of all her possessions, will leave the only house she has left to whoever marries first. Although Umut and F. Ece do not look forward to marriage, they go on a date with a different person every day in order to become the owner of the house and start looking for the right spouse.
